title: Camille, Mysterious Zaun/Piltover Icons on the PBE, Universe page, Jhin heading to Pilt, WW VGU....
body:
...What's that smell?
Well, apart from the stench of chemical waste and sewers of Zaun...

I smell a Piltover/Zaun Event heading our way!

replies.body: Seems possible,I mean it was said that WWs VGU would likely come after the next champion(Camille),so I could see them basically doing a 2-parter here(first a bit from Piltover,then something from Zaun)
ARRH-WHOOOOO!

You tease _and_ meme?!

_Has science gone too far?_

**_Is Reav3 the updated Warwick?_**

So many questions, but much fewer are the answers (at least for now)! D:
Find out next time on Dragon Ball Z (Z stands for Zaun)
{{champion:136}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:238}}
This might actually be the best comment here.
I don't get it

{{champion:136}} Dragon
{{champion:134}} Ball
{{champion:238}} Zed
England & company pronounce the letter Z as "Zed" if I remember correctly.
Yeah, pretty much anywhere that isn't America or Canada.
Canadians still say "Zed" not "Zee"
Logged in to upvote. You are a god!

https://lastfm-img2.akamaized.net/i/u/300x300/2d93edec69b5466d815ad98be101bcd6.jpg

*heavy metal howl*
Son. You better believe Powerwolf will be playing when the WW rework drops, and headphones will be exiled.
My teaser senses are tingling.
Any chance we'll be seeing everyone's favourite wolf next PBE cycle?
the next rework will be released in about 2 months sooo patch 7.3-7.4 or so

Where did you get that the rework comes in 2 months?From I know they only said that WWs rework will come after the next champ(camille)

And keep in mind that Riots winter break is coming soon.
The next patch will likely be the last patch of the year,with 7.1 likely coming out in mid january(which would be in almost 2 months).
well based on the new/rework champion release it happens basically every two months and i was guessing on the patch. and 7.1 is like 1 month away

Well in that case you should take another look at th rework/champion-releases this year,because then you'd knew that we get basically 1 rework/champion per month.I mean lets take a look at this years champion/rework-releases:
January-Shen Rework
Febuary-Jhin release(he was in the same patch as shen,but was released a few days later)
March-Aurelion Sol
April-Taric rework
May-Taliyah AND the mage update
June-Nothing,but thats not really important since may had 2 things,a champion and a class-update
July-Ryze update
August-Kled release
September-Yorick update
October-Ivern release
November-Assassin update
December-Camille release

So as you can see we got 12 champions/reworks/class-updates this year,basically 1 for every month.
Good eye, i was merely guessing and i was wrong so then but im still going with 7.2-7.4 for the next rework to go live

I'm assuming we're going to be getting something along the lines of Sabrewulf from KI.

https://www.primagames.com/media/images/news/KI-Sabrewulf_Big.jpg

Easy to kite impossible to fight.
I hope they don't make Warwick a result of chemical waste. That's Twitch's shtick.

He'll be an alchemically created Werewolf probably.
Like in his old, old Lore.

The lore that got so old that the champion connected to it didn't even make sense with the lore at the time?

Talkin bout Singed.
When his lore is updated/reverted I demand a Dr/Professor Warwick human transforming ultimate skin.

That's Mister Doctor PROFESSOR Warwick to you.


NOTE: Professor is such an odd word, if you think about it. "One-who-professes".
Excuse you, thats Supreme Mister Doctor PROFESSOR Warwick of Zaun!

I hope soraka is still tied into his lore.

Not because it was a good story or made that much sense but because I love soraka and want to see more of her.

Graves and Tobias are going there too if I recall correctly.

I hope we see also a bit of Jayce, he's been too much uninvolved in lore.

Indeed, Graves and TF is going to Piltover. Graves does need a new gun and he knows the perfect gunsmith to make it. That gunsmith lives in Piltover.

And about Jayce, I also hope Jayce will be in the event so Viktor can kick his as! ;) I really like Viktor and would like to se more of their conflict!
Where did we get that Jhin is going to Piltover? I loved the Burning Tides Trilogy, and so I am aware of Graves and TF.......but I don't remember seeing anywhere that Jhin is going there.

> [{quoted}](name=Paleo Electro,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EIiyJh0b,comment-id=000300010001,timestamp=2016-11-24T00:10:50.433+0000)
>
> Where did we get that Jhin is going to Piltover? I loved the Burning Tides Trilogy, and so I am aware of Graves and TF.......but I don't remember seeing anywhere that Jhin is going there.

I think they're talking about this line from [Jhin's background story](http://gameinfo.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/jhin/#champion-lore):

> _"From the jetty, Jhin looked back to the foreign ship. The tide had come in, and the ship would be leaving in a few moments. He would have to return soon if he was going to perform in Zaun next month. Risk on top of risk."_

Whether or not it's relevant; couldn't say.  It's definitely the bit of story that's being discussed above, though.  Also, if you've not read Jhin's story yet - it's a grisly ride.
Could u tell me where i can read up this stuff?

> [{quoted}](name=GayFluffyUnicorn,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EIiyJh0b,comment-id=000300010000,timestamp=2016-11-23T22:39:04.184+0000)
>
> Could u tell me where i can read up this stuff?

Look up towards the header of the site, there you shall encounter a link known as "Universe". The Universe is young, but filled with magical lore and conceptual artwork.

On the universe you can go to Bilgewater. And then you can read burning tides, it's a great story, the best one Riots made. That's atleast my opinion. In that story Graves and Twisted Fate say that they are going to Piltover to buy a new gun.

http://cdn.leagueoflegends.com/apollo/content/suqling/suqling_piltover.png

Rito, please!
I guess you got this pic on the new Universe website, but on what page exactly?
No, it's Suqling, a very talented artist.
That's Viktor and Jayce, but who is the girl? Caitlyn?

These are the collection of icons done by Sperasoft Studio (which also done many skin splash arts). As you can see there are several conceptual images of icons now released and those to be released, like the mentioned faction icons.
https://cdna0.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/004/017/140/large/sperasoft-studio-icons3.jpg?1479485423
https://cdna0.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/004/017/132/large/sperasoft-studio-icons4.jpg?1479485684
https://cdnb3.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/004/017/127/large/sperasoft-studio-icons1.jpg?1479485276
https://cdna0.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/004/017/112/large/sperasoft-studio-icons2.jpg?1479485142

I sencerly hope the faction icons will be future additional "starter" free icons, or at the very least all obtainable through IP or lore events similar to the Burning Tides.
Yeah,I feel somthing important as a faction icon shouldn't be a one-time-thing.
Where does it say that Jhin is heading to Piltover again?

> From the jetty, Jhin looked back to the foreign ship. The tide had come in, and the ship would be leaving in a few moments. He would have to return soon if he was going to perform in Zaun next month. Risk on top of risk.

From act IV of Jhin's color text.

Note that Piltover and Zaun are essentially the same place now.

Jhin?  Where does it say he's going to Piltover?  Because if he is, I'm excited.  They didn't put [Jhin's story](http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/jhin/) on to his universe page, and I've been wondering if they did that on purpose because they're about to update the Jhin vs. Shen/Zed arc.  The hype is real.
I'm wondering the same thing........where did this info come from?

> From the jetty, Jhin looked back to the foreign ship. The tide had come in, and the ship would be leaving in a few moments. He would have to return soon if he was going to perform in Zaun next month. Risk on top of risk.

From act IV.

Note that Zaun and Piltover are essentially the same place now.
Ohhhhh.  Okay.  Thanks.
Wait a second, Malicious, Jhin's heading to Pilt?
How I can Get Icon.I have PBE and I pLAy him
